Articles.Content:
true

the user below me has been in at least on RP.

false unless the old elevator became a rp type thing

the user below me has cats

Oh hell no!

I ain't helping these evil sonnuvabitces gaining world domination.

The user below me understand that true love only comes from dogs

Lol, I have a dog, but I don't mind cats.

The user below me is a mod.

nope

The user below me is watching me as I work my gypsy magic

False.

The user below me uses B9 Aerospace, FAR, and RemoteTech.

Cierto.

The user below me speaks Spanish.

False. No comprende espanola.

The user below is the user above.

Mebbeh...

The user below me is capable of using the Banhammer.

Incorrect! You are now BANNED... Oh... wait...

the user below me has launched a cargo-carrying space shuttle into orbit using a similar launch system to NASA's

No, whats the point when I can just strap it to an extremely overpowered launch vehicle?

The user below me is new to KSP.

Ahahahahahahahahahahaha no, not really, no...

The user below has been here at least since 0.15.

Yep.

The user below me arrived after 0.17

True, 0.19.

The user below me has not been able to make a working space shuttle in KSP.

(EDIT: Oops, I did not even realise that this is almost identical to the last post on the previous page. Oh well. )

false

why when I can just brute force the thing into orbit with SRBs?

the user below me has been here since 0.7.3

Nope, since 13.3

Guy below me is a very good KSP player

Absolutely abysmal.

The user below me is currently in a state of amusement.

Meh... somewhat true...

The user below me has never had an infraction.

Correct. (kehehehehehe)

The user below is afraid of KerbalKon.

False.

The user below me likes to design rockets IRL.

*in little kid voice* When I grow up, I wanna be a rocket scientist!

The user below me has an annoying sibling.

Yup.

The user below me didn't have enough boosters on their second-last launch.

Do I look like an amateur?

The user below me had to many boosters on their last launch.

True, and my Energia/Buran didn't make orbit because of it. (KER, you liar)

The user below me has attempted to recreate real rockets.

Yes. Once. It did not end well.

The user below me has gotten ninja'd on the day you replied to me.
